name: Ethiopia
description:
Ethiopia is an MMORPG game that has many Events, Items, Mobs, Maps, Players, and more! Ethiopia is a game in a time where everything wasn't so easy. There are no electronics, no nothing. There is however a magical being, people are unsure of its name, but it tends to come around Holidays or participate in special events. Ethiopia is the old society of Earth.

Discord - https://discord.gg/C9Ded2e
